backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that validates a fixed gift code and tracks per-principal redemption status.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI/music-control requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of all major frontend components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Guide explaining how to retry deployments, capture logs, and distinguish transient from code-related failures.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind/OKLCH theme variables and base styling for light/dark modes with Valentine color system.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint with root mount node and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the Valentine experience in BackgroundMusicProvider and renders MusicControlsPortal and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientEffectsLa: Renders floating hearts and sparkles as decorative ambient background effects.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout UI with signed‑in indicator and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/GiftCodeStep.tsx: Gift code input and redemption UI handling sign‑in requirement, validation, backend calls, and success state.
frontend/src/components/MusicControls.ts: Music control panel with play/pause, track navigation, volume, and diagnostics when provider context is missing.
frontend/src/components/MusicControlsPor: Creates and mounts a fixed portal container to render MusicControls above all content.
frontend/src/components/ValentineCardVie: Displays an interactive Valentine card that reveals its message on click with themed animations and styles.
frontend/src/components/ValentineStepCon: Renders navigation buttons for a multi-step Valentine flow including start, next, back, and replay actions.
frontend/src/content/valentineCards.ts: Exports a list of ValentineCard objects containing titles, messages, and optional icons for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCardNavigationGest: Adds keyboard and touch swipe gesture handlers for navigating between cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftCodeRedemption: Provides logic to check and redeem gift codes using the backend actor with UI feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and exposing login/clear utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder exporting nothing for now.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, Valentine-themed color variables, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/music/BackgroundMusicProvid: Provides React context for background music playback with track loading, persistence, and error handling using an underlying HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/music/playlist.ts: Defines the Track interface and exports a static playlist of five audio tracks with file paths.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineExperience.t: Implements the multi-step Valentine experience flow with card navigation, gift code logic, gestures, and triggers background music playback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Describes project state and known issue about missing music UI, including related existing feature requirements.
